stories.title: The Internet Is Made of Demons

stories.text:
Hi there,

I built an app to make it easy to add all your payment profile in one page. Here is a sample https://paylinkz.app/tawheed

One of the biggest challenge I run into all the time as a freelancer is that people are always asking me "How do you want to be paid?"

I detailed my motivations behind this here https://paylinkz.app/about
stories.title: Show HN: I made an app for all your payment links
How Did Life Spring Up from Non-Life? Scientists May Finally Have Some Clues
China's Xiaohongshu kicks off staff layoffs: Source

stories.text: I'm working as a data analyst/scientist for two years and I'm already tired. In theory everything is amazing, the math, the algorithms, until u get a job. Useless and endless meetings, useless requests, arbitrary and weird decisions to make the boss and customers happy. We end working 40+ hours/week but the job could be easily done in 30 or less, that is another thing that kills me inside. We all could be living our lives in those hours that we pretend we're doing something. I know it sounds like I'm depressed and all that but I love life, my problem is with the state of things in the corporate environment, the faking and pretending that all is perfect in the way it is, and in the job but in the end everyone is unhappy and feeling like shit and waiting for friday. I just dont know what to do because it sounds to me that every company is the same. Does anyone else feels like that? What do you do to overcome this feeling?
stories.title: Ask HN: Anyone else is tired of all the corporate bs?
Do you really need that Mobile App?
The Gdelt Project – A Global Database of Society
Australia spent a million dollars training me – and now I’m leaving

stories.text:
Today I remembered a news that I saw in iOS 14. Link here:

https://www.gsmarena.com/ios_14_found_to_keep_user_data_even_after_deleting_the_app-news-47676.php

I've tried to find any updates or responses from Apple, but the answer is nothing.

It is important to note that the Keychain here is not exactly the same as the iCloud Keychain, whether you enable iCloud Keychain or not, applications can still use it to track your installation behavior. In the era of iOS 15, where Apple places more emphasis on privacy, why are users helpless with such super cookies?
stories.title: iOS 15 still keeps user data even after deleting apps
